name: SpellWiggler
description:
A silly game of casting spells by wiggling your arms. It's also about trying to live in the uncomfortable space between. Gamepads have had analog sticks for years, but we're always mashing them to the extremes. It's time to be silly and live in the wiggly space.

Objective:

Follow the lines so the dots match up with the end of the lines. Following closer gives you more points. Try to get the highest percentage!

Controls:

You need a controller with triggers and two joysticks to play.

L2/R2 - move Green dots up and down

Left Joystick - move left Red & Blue dots up/down left/right

Right Joystick - move right Red & Blue dots up/down left/right
